headline: Hilton Announces Second Quarter 2025 Earnings Release Date
summary: MCLEAN, Va., June 25, 2025--Hilton Worldwide Holdings Inc. (NYSE: HLT) will report second quarter 2025 financial results before the stock market opens on Wednesday, July 23, 2025, followed by a conference call at 9 a.m. EDT. Christopher J. Nassetta, president & chief executive officer, Hilton, and Kevin Jacobs, executive vice president & chief financial officer, Hilton, will discuss the company's performance and lead a question-and-answer session.
